1.name: Cleanse
1.description: Removes all disables (excluding suppression and airborne) and summoner spell debuffs affecting your champion and gives Tenacity.

3.name: Exhaust
3.description: Slows target enemy champion and reduces their damage dealt.

4.name: Flash
4.description: Teleports you a short distance toward your cursor.

6.name: Ghost
6.description: Gain Move Speed and ignore unit collision for the duration.

7.name: Heal
7.description: Restores Health and grants Move Speed to you and target allied champion.

13.name: Clarity
13.description: Restores your and ally champion's Mana.

14.name: Ignite
14.description: Deals true damage over time to target enemy champion and reduces healing effects on them for the duration.

32.name: Mark
32.description: Throw a snowball in a straight line at your enemies. If it hits an enemy, they become marked, granting True Sight, and your champion can quickly travel to the marked target as a follow up.
